SETTINGS.MenuHint: Configure settings for the Eventide RP System.
SETTINGS.InitativeFormulaHint: Formula used to calculate initiative in combat. Cannot be empty. Leave empty and save to reset to default.
SETTINGS.InitiativeFormulaReloadPrompt: The initiative formula has been updated. It's recommended to reload the game for this change to fully take effect. Reload now?
SETTINGS.InitiativeDecimalsHint: Number of decimal places to display for initiative values.
SETTINGS.DefaultCharacterTabHint: The tab that will be active by default when opening a character sheet.
SETTINGS.DefaultDiceRollModeHint: The default visibility mode for dice rolls.
SETTINGS.AutoRollNpcInitiativeHint: Automatically roll initiative for NPCs when added to initiative.
SETTINGS.AutoRollPlayerInitiativeHint: Automatically roll initiative for players when added to initiative.
SETTINGS.HideNpcInitiativeRollsHint: Hide the initiative roll results for NPCs from players.
SETTINGS.DefaultCombatRoundDurationHint: Default duration of a combat round in seconds.
SETTINGS.SheetThemeHint: Choose a visual theme for all system applications. This affects the background, colors, and overall aesthetic of character sheets, item sheets, and other system windows.
SETTINGS.ShowGearEquipMessagesHint: If enabled, chat messages will be created when gear items are equipped or unequipped.
SETTINGS.GearEquippedDefaultHint: If enabled, gear creator will mark new gear as equipped by default.
SETTINGS.EnableActionCardChainsHint: When enabled, action cards can use attack chains to apply damage and status effects based on roll results.
SETTINGS.ActionCardExecutionDelayHint: Delay in milliseconds between each step of action card execution (0-10000ms, in 100ms increments).
SETTINGS.CrToXpFormulaHint: Formula for converting Challenge Rating to Experience Points. Use @cr to reference the CR value. Use simple math operations (+, -, *, /) and dice notation. Example: '@cr * 200 + @cr * @cr * 50'
SETTINGS.DefaultTokenVisionRangeHint: Default vision range in grid units for newly created actor tokens. All tokens start with vision enabled.
SETTINGS.EnableSystemSoundsHint: Enable or disable system sound effects.
SETTINGS.SoundSettingsHint: Configure custom sound effects for various game events.
SETTINGS.SoundSettingsDescription: Customize the sound effects used by the Eventide RP System. Leave a field blank to reset to default.
SETTINGS.SoundHealingHint: Sound played when healing is applied.
SETTINGS.SoundDamageHint: Sound played when damage is applied.
SETTINGS.SoundStatusApplyHint: Sound played when a status effect is applied.
SETTINGS.SoundStatusRemoveHint: Sound played when a status effect is removed.
SETTINGS.SoundGearEquipHint: Sound played when gear is equipped.
SETTINGS.SoundGearUnequipHint: Sound played when gear is unequipped.
SETTINGS.SoundCombatPowerHint: Sound played when a combat power is used.
SETTINGS.SoundFeatureRollHint: Sound played when a feature with roll capability is used.
SETTINGS.SoundInitiativeHint: Sound played when initiative is rolled.
SETTINGS.SoundDiceRollHint: Sound played when a dice roll is made.
SETTINGS.AllSoundsReset: All sounds reset to defaults. Click Save to apply changes.
SETTINGS.NoPlayerPermission: Players do not have permission to change sound settings.
SETTINGS.TestingModeHint: Enable or disable testing mode console logging for debugging.
SETTINGS.MinimumDiceValueHint: The minimum value that can be rolled on a dice check
SETTINGS.MaxPowerFormulaHint: Formula to calculate the maximum power for an actor. Default: max(5 + @will.total + @fort.total, 1).
SETTINGS.MaxPowerFormulaWarning: Max Power formula cannot be empty. Resetting to default.
SETTINGS.MaxResolveFormulaHint: Formula to calculate the maximum resolve for an actor. Default: max(100 + (10 * @fort.total), 10).
SETTINGS.MaxResolveFormulaWarning: Max Resolve formula cannot be empty. Resetting to default.
SETTINGS.StatPointsFormulaHint: Formula to calculate the maximum stat points for a character. Use @lvl.value for level. Set to '0' to disable color coding. Default: 14 + (2 * @lvl.value).
SETTINGS.StatPointsFormulaWarning: Stat Points formula cannot be empty. Resetting to default.
SETTINGS.MinimumPowerValueHint: The minimum value that an actor's max power can be. Applies after percentage multipliers.
SETTINGS.MinimumPowerValueWarning: Minimum Power Value must be a non-negative integer. Resetting to default ({0}).
SETTINGS.MinimumResolveValueHint: The minimum value that an actor's max resolve can be. Applies after percentage multipliers.
SETTINGS.MinimumResolveValueWarning: Minimum Resolve Value must be a positive integer (1 or greater). Resetting to default ({0}).
SETTINGS.ActionCardExecutionLimitHint: Maximum number of action cards that can be executed per turn
